import { useState } from "react"; import { addApplicant } from "../Service/api"; const AddApplicant = () => { const [ applicantData, setApplicantData] = useState({ studentName: "", registrationNumber: "", preferences:"" }) const { studentName, registrationNumber, preferences} = applicantData; const handleChannge = (e) => { setApplicantData( {...applicantData, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] } ) } const addDetails = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await addApplicant(applicantData); } return (
handleChannge(e)} /> handleChannge(e)} />
